channel.title: Making your guy fly?
channel.description: Ok i got the command for it and added it and when i use it he just goes up for a few secs then comes back down how do i make it so he can fly forever?!?!? thx for helP!

item.title: Making your guy fly?
item.dc:creator: @R4nge R4nge
item.description:
@R4nge wrote:

Yeah like rofl I dont know im not getting any errors this is all what i have

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("fly")) { setAnimation(1500); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851; playerEnergy = 9999; playerLevel[3] = 9999; sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149); sendFrame126("Flying Skill", 4902); sendFrame126("Welcome to Corrupted Isle new skill", 4903); sendFrame126("The first time u fly ?", 4904); sendFrame126("try to build up ur lvl", 4905); sendFrame126("", 4906); sendFrame75(2, 4901); sendFrame164(4900); flushOutStream(); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

My flying command above.

if(spellID == 1539 && (playerRights == 1 || playerRights == 2 || playerRights == 3)) { if(Inair == false) { actionAmount++; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; setAnimation(1500); sendMessage("You rise to the air."); playerSE = 1501; playerSER = 1501; playerSEW = 1501; actionTimer = 0; Inair = true; } if(Inair == true && actionTimer <= 0) { teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; setAnimation(1502); sendMessage("You electricute "+castOnPlayer.playerName+"!"); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You get electricuted!"); castOnPlayer.hitDiff = 1 + misc.random(6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; castOnPlayer.setAnimation(3170); castOnPlayer.entangle(); playerSE = 1501; playerSER = 1501; playerSEW = 1501; if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) { hitDiff = EnemyHP; } //castOnPlayer.hitDiff = hitDiff; castOnPlayer.KillerId = playerId; castOnPlayer.updateRequired = true; castOnPlayer.hitUpdateRequired = true; } } if(playerLevel[6] > 0) { int casterX = absX; int casterY = absY; int offsetX = (casterX - EnemyX) * -1; int offsetY = (casterY - EnemyY) * -1;

[code]public boolean Inair = false;
public Calendar cal = new GregorianCalendar();
public int hour12 = cal.get(Calendar.HOUR); // 0…11
public int hour24 = cal.get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY); // 0…23
public int min = cal.get(Calendar.MINUTE); // 0…59

item.title: Making your guy fly?
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

ok, i deleted my flyin command but i used the same thing for this 1, basicly the same but he surfs instead,

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“slide”) && playerRights >= 0)
{
setAnimation(755);
playerSE = 755;
playerSEW = 755;
playerSER = 755;
playerSEA = 755;
playerEnergy = 99999999;
playerLevel[3] = 99999999;
sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149);
sendMessage(“wooo dude look at u rip!”);
updateRequired = true;

appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“slideoff”) && playerRights >= 0){
sendMessage(“surfin over dude”);
playerSE = 0x328;
playerSEW = 0x333;
playerSER = 0x338;
playerSEA = 0x326;
playerEnergy = 100;
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149);
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}[/code]

okthats my slide command, and heres what you neeed to make him fly constinly

Pay attention to the arrows u need those spots to make the guy fly perm. <—

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("slide") && playerRights >= 0) { setAnimation(755); <---- thats ur start animation playerSE = 755; <-- } playerSEW = 755; <-- } All these are the animations when you move, i set mine the same cuz i want the playerSER = 755; <---} same effect at all times. you need to find the right animations, and put them there playerSEA = 755; <---} [br][size=1]Posted on: July 03, 2007, 03:43:57 PM[/size][hr]if you hold on a sec i have a back up server… i have the fly command on that
